A Guide to the Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Administrative Records, Accession 2016.059, RG 1, Series 2 FA1130

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Administrative Records, Accession 2016.059, RG 1, Series 2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: RBF began supporting the New School Committee in 1975. The report available here documents and evaluates the project to build Junior High School I.S. 131, including the broader implications for the planning of urban schools.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Rockefeller Archive Center has title to the collection and has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection. Rockefeller Brothers Fund retains copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

did.unittitle: Consultant Report - New School Committee Report - Junior High School I.S. 131, 1969-1977 June 7
